"use client" import { Github, Instagram, Twitter, Youtube } from "lucide-react" import { Button } from "@/components/ui/button" const YEAR = new Date().getFullYear() export default function Footers01() { return (

All rights reserved. Copyright © {YEAR} Creative Tim.

) }

meta.details: Try this minimalist footer example with social links and copyright statement, styled with shadcn/ui components for a clean and cohesive layout.
